description.raw:
Support for getting the major version from CMakeLists.txt and use it to select the gazebodistro file when running colcon generic build job.

Failing here for a branch containing ign-rendering1 but getting ign-rendering0 deps:

* Note the invalid cmake1, math5, etc.  [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_rendering-pr-win/40/consoleFull#console-section-5](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/40/consoleFull#console-section-5)

Working here for the same branch:

* cmake2, math6, … [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_rendering-pr-win/41/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign_rendering-pr-win/41/console)
